scripts.deploy:mainnets:project: source ./.env && export START_TIME=$(date +%s) && npx sphinx propose ./script/ConfigureFeeProject.s.sol --networks mainnets
scripts.deploy:mainnets:fix: source ./.env && export START_TIME=$(date +%s) && npx sphinx propose ./script/DeployFix.s.sol --networks mainnets
scripts.deploy:testnets:project: source ./.env && export START_TIME=$(date +%s) && npx sphinx propose ./script/ConfigureFeeProject.s.sol --networks testnets
scripts.deploy:testnets:fix: source ./.env && export START_TIME=$(date +%s) && npx sphinx propose ./script/DeployFix.s.sol --networks testnets
